bio: Crypto Enthusiastic and Long-Term Crypto Investor
impactDescription: I explained the advantages of using Opstack in the written projects such as Simplicity, Scalability, Security, Flexibility and User Experience. I think that people who have experienced the projects will have more confidence in the projects if they know that these projects were developed using Opstack.
contributionDescription:
I prepared a series of articles explaining Optimism's development of Opstack and the formation of the superchain, and then introducing the projects developed with Opstack and examining the advantages of using Opstack.
My purpose in writing these articles is to explain how the Opstack technology developed by Optimism is adopted and used. Also, helping the adoption of projects developed with Opstack was among my plans.
